284040.name: The Inner World Soundtrack
284040.description:
The Inner World - Original Soundtrack


Enjoy the songs and melodies of The Inner World and explore Asposia with your own senses. Close your eyes, meet your favorite characters and enjoy the journey through the unique sounds and music tracks of the bizarre world in the universe of soil!

All songs composed & arranged by: Christian Barth ()
All songs produced by: Philipp Kobilke ()

Tracks


  • 01 - Anticipation (01:04)
  • 02 - The Bar (02:56)
  • 03 - Mechanical Shelter (04:09)
  • 04 - Red Bad Monk (04:50)
  • 05 - 3 Guys And 1 Contrabass (04:56)
  • 06 - The Forgotten Gate (02:44)
  • 07 - Traces of Dynasty (05:10)
  • 08 - Faded Memories (02:59)
  • 09 - Maintenance Hangar (06:34)
  • 10 - Glassy Prison (05:09)
  • 11 - The Wind Dies (07:11)
  • 12 - Fighting The Darkness (04:15)
  • 13 - BONUS: The Wind Song (02:41)
284040.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
